name: Zcash
keyFeatures: Zero-knowledge encryption (zk-SNARKs) for private peer-to-peer payments
Encrypted memo field for secret messages with transactions
Self-funded development via block reward allocation
targetAudience: Zcash holders wanting self-custody multichain access
UTXO coin holders wanting unified wallet management
Users wanting to acquire ZEC without KYC
valueProposition: Zcash is the first cryptocurrency to implement zero-knowledge encryption for private digital payments. With ShapeShift, users can send, receive, and swap ZEC alongside BTC, ETH, and 100+ other assets — no KYC, no custody, no exchange account required.
technicalHighlights: zk-SNARKs (zero-knowledge succinct non-interactive arguments of knowledge) for transaction privacy
UTXO model with transparent t-addresses and shielded z-addresses
~16.5M ZEC outstanding supply, ~5M ZEC in shielded pool
ShapeShift integration supports transparent/unshielded t-addresses for send, receive, and swap
Built-in UTXO management within ShapeShift (same approach as Bitcoin)
integrationOpportunities: ShapeShift supports ZEC send, receive, and swap via transparent t-addresses
Users can swap any supported asset (BTC, ETH, etc.) into ZEC without a centralized exchange
UTXO management handled natively by ShapeShift, same as Bitcoin
Future opportunity: shielded z-address support for full Zcash privacy
risks: Regulatory scrutiny around privacy coins (delistings from some exchanges)
Current integration limited to transparent t-addresses — not full Zcash privacy
Potential confusion between transparent and shielded transaction types
Market perception challenges around privacy coin utility and compliance
competitorComparison: Zashi (by Electric Coin Company) is the official Zcash wallet but supports ZEC only — no multichain. Exodus, Trust Wallet, and Atomic Wallet support ZEC alongside other assets but are centralized companies with limited privacy guarantees. CEXs like Coinbase and Gemini require KYC to buy/sell ZEC, undermining the privacy ethos. ShapeShift is the only self-custodial multichain platform where users can hold ZEC alongside BTC, ETH, and 100+ assets, swap into ZEC from any supported token, and manage UTXOs — all without KYC or custody.
